data.displayName: STD Sumo Essential Residential TOU Interval + CL

fees.description: This fee is only applicable for payments made by credit card and debit card.

A standard connection fee of $88.51 (ex GST) applies when you requested a connection of your electricity supply during standard business hours (Monday to Friday, excluding public holidays) when the site is already connected. If meter access is not available at the time of connection,a fee of $84.15 (ex GST) will apply. All fees are subject to change and may vary depending on your distribution network or specific property requirements. Additional charges may apply for urgent or after-hours.

electricityContract.terms: Offer not available in all areas or properties. Residential customers only. Please refer to our website https://www.sumo.com.au/help-and-support/terms-and-conditions/sumo-terms-and-conditions for full terms and conditions.
electricityContract.variation: Prices, fees and charges are subject to change. We will give you at least 5 business days prior notice.

eligibility.description: Offer not available in all areas or properties. You must be a residential customer with an applicable network tariff for a premises where Sumo supplies Electricity. Please refer to our website https://www.sumo.com.au/help-and-support/terms-and-conditions/sumo-terms-and-conditions for full terms and conditions.

solarFeedInTariff.description: If you have installed solar PV at the Premises, you may be eligible to be paid for excess electricity you feed back into the grid.

electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: We will pass through any fee imposed by your distributor, including fees for disconnection or reconnection, or special meter read on move-out. Distributor fees published at https://www.sumo.com.au/help-and-support/rates-and-other-charges/other-fees-and-charges. Fee applied to your next bill.
